thread.title: Viola Davis displays cleavage at pre-Oscars party in LA | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Viola Davis displays cleavage at pre-Oscars party in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Viola Davis displays cleavage at pre-Oscars party in LA | Daily Mail Online
text: She's a front-runner to scoop an Oscar for her performance in Fences on Sunday. And Viola Davis made sure all eyes were on her at a pre-Academy Awards party on Wednesday. The 51-year-old looked like a contender for the best-supporting dress as she put on a daring display of cleavage at the 8th Annual Oscars Sistahs Soiree in Los Angeles. Got front! Viola Davis made sure all eyes were on her at a pre-Academy Awards party on Wednesday The Golden Globe winner chose a plunging black and cream gown, which was cut away at the side and drew attention to her fabulous figure. The youthful beauty didn't distract with accessories or jewellery, and let her dress be the showstopper. She wore her chestnut tresses in a chin-length bob with soft waves framing her pretty features. Daring: The Golden Globe winner chose a plunging black and cream gown, which was cut away at the side and drew attention to her fabulous figure The star - who also won a SAG Award for Fences - kept her make-up fresh - letting her flawless complexion lead, with added lashes and a caramel gloss. Viola is a three-time Academy Award nominee - making her the most nominated black actress in history - and is nominated for her role opposite Denzel Washington in the August Wilson drama. She plays long-suffering wife Rose, in the story of Troy Maxson, a mid-century Pittsburgh sanitation worker who once dreamed of a baseball career. Fabulous: The 51-year-old looked like a contender for the best-supporting dress as she put on a daring display of cleavage at the 8th Annual Oscars Sistahs Soiree in Los Angeles Looking good: The star - who also won a SAG Award for Fences - kept her make-up fresh - letting her flawless complexion lead, with added lashes and a caramel gloss Fences has four nominations on Sunday, including Best Picture. Viola was joined in the pre-Oscars festivities by Oscar-winner and fellow nominee Octavia Spencer. The 46-year-old Hidden Figures star looked stylish in all-black at the event. Fellow nominee: Octavia Spencer looked elegant in all-black at the event Stylish: Ruth Negga wrapped a fur stole around her shoulders and channeled classic Hollywood glamour with a striking red lip Ruth Negga added a pop of vivid brights to her ensemble, by way of bubblegum pink heels. She wrapped a fur stole around her shoulders and channeled classic Hollywood glamour with a striking red lip. Tracee Ellis Ross, 44, and Rashida Jones, 40 also joined Alfre Woodard who was hosting the party. Party girls: Octavia Spencer, Viola Davis and Ruth Negga pose together Fringe benefits: Viola was joined by Tracee Ellis Ross, who rocked pale pink All smiles: Rosario Dawson and Rashida Jones were also in attendance Lace lady: Alfre Woodard hosted the annual pre-Oscars bash Share or comment on this article 115
